text: Bwo batunulako, e mibiri gyabwe gikusanyusa, bwe boogera toyinza butatwala kigambo kyabwe, balinga ebiti ebyesigamiziddwa ku kisenge nga tebiyinza kwetengerera, buli lwonna lwe bawulira akakuba bagamba nti bubakeeredde, abo be balabe, n'olwekyo beegendereze, Katonda yabakolimira, ggwe ate bandivudde batya ku mazima
